summary: ¿Otro Juego De Digimon Para Nintendo Switch En Camino? #shironodesaina #nekodemonio #CorporativoArcanos #Noticias #Nintendo...
title: ¿Otro Juego De Digimon Para Nintendo Switch En Camino? #shironodesaina #nekodemonio #CorporativoArcanos #Noticias #Nintendo #Digimon
body:
¿Otro Juego De Digimon Para Nintendo Switch En Camino? #shironodesaina #nekodemonio #CorporativoArcanos #Noticias #Nintendo #Digimon

Según dos comercios españoles, hay otro juego de Digimon para Nintendo Switch y se trata de Digimon Story: Cyber Sleuth Hacker’s Memory.

Actualmente, sabemos que Digimon Survive está en camino de la consola híbrida de Nintendo. No se saben todos los detalles, pero se manejó que sabríamos más antes de que iniciara el verano. Mientras Bandai Namco comparte más información, parece que está en…

title: Astral Chain Para Nintendo Switch No Es Scalebound #shironodesaina #nekodemonio #CorporativoArcanos #Noticias #Nintendo
body:
Astral Chain Para Nintendo Switch No Es Scalebound #shironodesaina #nekodemonio #CorporativoArcanos #Noticias #Nintendo

El diseñador Atsushi Inaba desmiente entre risas la idea de que el cancelado Scalebound se transformó en Astral Chain para Nintendo Switch.

Vaya, hasta que VGC decidió compartir de una vez la entrevista que le hizo a Atsushi Inaba de PlatinumGames. Varias de las cosas de las que habla este diseñador las he abordado antes, como el proceso de desarrollo de Bayonetta 3 o la inexistencia de Scaleb…

title: Nintendo Comparte Sus Planes Del E3 2019 #shironodesaina #nekodemonio #CorporativoArcanos #Noticias #E3 #E32019 #Nintendo
body:
Nintendo Comparte Sus Planes Del E3 2019 #shironodesaina #nekodemonio #CorporativoArcanos #Noticias #E3 #E32019 #Nintendo

Además del Nintendo Direct E3 2019 y Nintendo Treehouse: Live, habrá torneos de Super Smash Bros. Ultimate y Splatoon 2 antes del evento.

Estamos en mayo todavía y es por lo mismo que es un buen momento para que Nintendo comparta sus planes para el E3 2019, que iniciará en unas semanas. En concreto, del 11 al 13 de junio en Centro de Convenciones de Los Angeles, California. Para la Gran N todo…

blog.name: pokemon-professor-sakura
blog.title: Asks: CLOSED! Submissions: OPEN!
blog.description:
(This is a roleplay blog run by @chickadee567)

((Talking out of character))

Hello there! I’m Professor Sakura, and I’m always willing

to help trainers and caretakers with their Pokemon.

You can ask me about Pokemon behavior, where certain Pokemon can be found,

and even report sightings of rare or mythical Pokemon.

((Search for the tag #rules to find rules for asks and submissions!))

summary: hey, you know that challenger in the sinnoh league that one time, the one with the darkrai and latias... tobias, i think? what...
question: hey, you know that challenger in the sinnoh league that one time, the one with the darkrai and latias... tobias, i think? what was up with him? how was he even allowed in the league?
answer:
Maybe he bribed his way in? Or lied about what Pokemon were on his team? I’m not sure, but all do know that he was immediately disqualified and the Darkrai and Latias were taken away and released.

- Professor Sakura

reblog.comment:

- Professor Sakura

summary: Facts on goomy? :)
question: Facts on goomy? :)
answer:
• Goomy are herbivores.
  • They’re the easiest Dragon-type to care for due to their calm temperament.
  • They need a humid environment so they don’t dry out. You should have a cool, shady place for them to sleep in. It’s also recommended to give them damp towels to sleep with.
  • Make sure they have plenty of water to drink!
  • If your Goomy looks like they’re melting, this means they’re dehydrated. Get them some water and put them in a cool, shady place immediately.

- Professor Sakura

reblog.comment:

  • Make sure they have plenty of water to drink!
  • If your Goomy looks like they’re melting, this means they’re dehydrated. Get them some water and put them in a cool, shady place immediately.

- Professor Sakura

  • They need a humid environment so they don’t dry out. You should have a cool, shady place for them to sleep in. It’s also recommended to give them damp towels to sleep with.

summary: nintendo should make a princess centered game where you can play as peach/daisy/pauline/rosalina to rescue...

nintendo should make a princess centered game where you can play as peach/daisy/pauline/rosalina to rescue mario/luigi/toad/etc

it can even be a platformer like the normal mario bros but it should happen

May livestream on saturdays, usually at 2 pm GMT-3. Check my ko-fi page for stream announcements!

Arthur/21/Aro/Ace/Trans He/him or They/them appreciated. This blog's been reduced to mostly art and oc content. I hope you enjoy it regardless!

Probably autistic? And forgets things a lot. Thinks referring to himself in third person is cool.
Amateur character and creature designer, likes to pretend he's a game designer too although with no real experience.
